name: Joe (Datacompaniet)
overview: Rare to see an 8-bit, single person platform game from Norway. Programmed by Svein A. Berg in 1985 and released by Datacompaniet. Take Joe over the stile, get all the keys and get back to the safe without being caught by the guards. use joystick or key: CTRL for left, arrow left for down, 1 for up, 2 for right and space for jump. Press a key and get playing! Choose Factory for a game creation kit for this game.
